snippet: A senior American diplomat said on Wednesday that Washington wanted North Korea to improve ties with South Korea before it would resume talks with leaders in Pyongyang.
abstract: Kurt M Campbell, an assistant secretary of state, says Washington wants North Korea to improve ties with South Korea before it will resume talks with leaders in Pyongyang.
lead_paragraph: A senior American diplomat said on Wednesday that Washington wanted North Korea to improve ties with South Korea before it would resume talks with leaders in Pyongyang.

headline.seo: U.S. Envoy Pushes for Improved Ties Between Koreas
headline.main: U.S. Envoy Pushes for Improved Ties Between Koreas
headline.print_headline: South Korea: U.S. ‘Open to Diplomacy’ With North, State Dept. Official Says
